title: Starburner
description: A hidden legacy. A shared destiny.   All Princess Rika wants is to be a moonburner like her mother, but her powers are nowhere to be found. When a fleet of dark ships appears on the horizon, Rika is convinced this is the perfect opportunity to force her magic to manifest. But the ships bring more than Rika bargained for—an invasion of soul-eating monsters intent on consuming all she holds dear.  Overwhelmed and outmatched, Rika finds an unlikely ally in Vikal—a dangerous man enslaved to the monsters that killed his family and ravaged his homeland. Thrown together in a desperate attempt to evade the soul-eaters, they begin to realize they have more in common than they ever thought possible. Alone, their lands and people are doomed to fall to the encroaching darkness. But together, they have a prayer of a chance to save their worlds. And to find something more in the process.   Don't miss this final book in the Moonburner Cycle! Can be read as a stand-alone novel.   Perfect for fans of: Teen Science Fiction and Fantasy Young Adult Romance Young Adult Fantasy Young Adult Action & Adventure Coming of Age Strong female protagonists Sabaa Tahir, Sarah J. Maas, and Leigh Bardugo
author: Claire Luana
